attributes.action: Get more bald men back in the public eye
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears over the years that bald men have been dissapearing from our TV screens. Right Said Fred made a short come back, but other than that nothing. Sky TV even sent Ross Kemp to Afiganistan to 'get him out of the picture' I presume. Sign the petition and unite baldies of the UK. Take the power back fellow slap heads

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
